p: Against MCF-7, the essential oil did not present cytotoxic action at the tested concentrations. Methanolic extract, chalcones and ursolic acid isolated from the leaves of this species presented cytotoxic activity against such cellular types [ 9, 42]. This suggests that differential content or concentration, especially of polar compounds in B. salicifolius, may be related to cytotoxic action against MCF-7 cells.
